R

RemoteWebRepository - Class in it.bori.jbfw.core.webrepo
Remote Web Repository Connector class that allow user to interact ( only view and navigate ) inside a remote Java Content Repository an URL it's normally builded like "http://localhost:4502/crx/server/crx.default"
RemoteWebRepository(String, int, String, String, String, boolean) - Constructor for class it.bori.jbfw.core.webrepo.RemoteWebRepository
Default constructor, connect to a remove Java Content Repository, if username and/or password are empty or null it will throw a RemoteWebRepositoryAuthenticationException
RemoteWebRepository(String, int, String, String, String) - Constructor for class it.bori.jbfw.core.webrepo.RemoteWebRepository
Less specific constructor, connect to a remove Java Content Repository, if username and/or password are empty or null it will throw a RemoteWebRepositoryAuthenticationException
RemoteWebRepository(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class it.bori.jbfw.core.webrepo.RemoteWebRepository
Basic constructor, connect to a remove Java Content Repository, if username and/or password are empty or null it will throw a RemoteWebRepositoryAuthenticationException
RemoteWebRepositoryAuthenticationException - Exception in it.bori.jbfw.core.exception
Called when user name or password are not valid
RemoteWebRepositoryAuthenticationException() - Constructor for exception it.bori.jbfw.core.exception.RemoteWebRepositoryAuthenticationException
Default constructor, called when user name or password are not valid
RemoteWebRepositoryParsingException - Exception in it.bori.jbfw.core.exception
Called when an error occurred while parsing and fetching the content from a given path
RemoteWebRepositoryParsingException(String) - Constructor for exception it.bori.jbfw.core.exception.RemoteWebRepositoryParsingException
Default constructor, called when an error occurred while parsing and fetching the content from a given path
